name: Crusader Kings II: Rajas of India
name_original: Crusader Kings II: Rajas of India
description:
Crusader Kings II: Rajas of India is a strategy game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It came out on 25-03-2014. It was published by Paradox Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Crusader Kings II: Rajas of India on PC.
